mapper.select: select * from (select c.*, rownum rn from (select B.send_email, A.note_con, B.rcv_date, B.read_fl, B.rcv_del_fl from NOTE_CONTENT A, NOTE_INFO B where A.note_con_id = B.note_con_id and B.rcv_email = #{rcv_email} order by rcv_date) c) where (#{page}-1)*#{pageSize} + 1 and rn <=#{page}*#{pageSize}
select count(*) from NOTE_CONTENT A, NOTE_INFO B where A.note_con_id = B.note_con_id and B.rcv_email = #{rcv_email}

select * from (select c.*, rownum rn from (select B.rcv_email, A.note_con, B.send_date, B.read_fl, B.send_del_fl from NOTE_CONTENT A, NOTE_INFO B where A.note_con_id = B.note_con_id and B.send_email = #{send_email} order by rcv_date) c) where (#{page}-1)*#{pageSize} + 1 and rn <=#{page}*#{pageSize}
select count(*) from NOTE_CONTENT A, NOTE_INFO B where A.note_con_id = B.note_con_id and B.send_email = #{send_email}
